1.2.name: wordpress/wpmyrollpage
1.2.description:
wpMyRollPage displays your your links (blogroll and the such) on a page of your choosing, the output can be formatted in various ways.

You can: + Specify which link categories are displayed. + Specify if the category headers are shown, and in what size and style. + Specify if the links ratings are shown. + Specify how the links ratings are shown (many different icons to choose, from stars and medals to hearts!) + Specify if the links pictures should be shown. + Specify if the links descriptions should be shown.

And much more to come! If you want wpMyRollPage to do something that it doesn't just let me know!
